meanings.definition: The process of becoming hard or solid.
meanings.sent1: The hardenings of the clay took time in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The hardenings of the cement made the sidewalk strong.
meanings.sent3: The hardenings of the ice cream made it impossible to scoop.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was like the hardenings of steel, unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The hardenings of the lava created a new rock formation.

meanings.definition: The act of making something hard or solid.
meanings.sent1: His constant hammering led to the hardenings of the metal.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor's chisel brought about the hardenings of the marble.
meanings.sent3: The hardenings of the cake batter surprised the baker.
meanings.sent4: The hardenings of the glue sealed the envelope shut.
meanings.sent5: The hardenings of the clay pots made them durable.

meanings.definition: A physical or mental toughening or strengthening.
meanings.sent1: The hardenings of his heart made him less emotional.
meanings.sent2: The hardenings of her muscles came from daily exercise.
meanings.sent3: The hardenings of his attitude made him seem unapproachable.
meanings.sent4: The hardenings of her determination led her to success.
meanings.sent5: The hardenings of his mind helped him face challenges bravely.
